expo.name: Make My Knot - Matrimony App
expo.description: India's premier matrimony app with AI-powered matching, astrology compatibility, and verified profiles for finding your perfect life partner.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Make My Knot needs camera access to help you upload beautiful profile photos that showcase your personality to potential matches.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Make My Knot needs photo library access to help you select and upload profile photos from your gallery.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Make My Knot uses your location to show you compatible matches nearby and help you find your perfect life partner in your area.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Make My Knot needs microphone access to enable voice messages and video calls with your matches.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Make My Knot can help you find friends and family on the platform with your permission.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Make My Knot can help you schedule meetings with potential matches.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Use Face ID to securely and quickly sign in to your Make My Knot account.

plugins.photosPermission: Make My Knot needs access to your photo library to help you upload beautiful profile photos.
plugins.cameraPermission: Make My Knot needs camera access to help you take stunning profile photos.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Make My Knot uses your location to show compatible matches in your area and help you find your perfect life partner nearby.

plugins.cameraPermission: Make My Knot needs camera access for profile photos and video calls with matches.
